mapper.select: select recipeno, memberid,point,comments,regDate from valuation where recipeno = #{recipeno} order by regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into valuation (recipeno, memberid, point, comments, regDate) values (#{recipeno},#{memberid},#{point},#{comments},sysdate)
mapper.delete: delete from valuation where memberid = #{memberid} and recipeno = #{recipeno}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERID, RECIPENO, POINT, COMMENTS, REGDATE FROM (SELECT SEQ, MEMBERID, RECIPENO, POINT, COMMENTS, REGDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, MEMBERID, RECIPENO, POINT, COMMENTS, REGDATE FROM (SELECT * FROM VALUATION WHERE recipeno = #{recipeno} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC)) WHERE SEQ >= #{cri.rowStart} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{cri.rowEnd}
select count(recipeno) from valuation where recipeno = #{recipeno}
select nvl(round(avg(point)),0) from valuation where recipeno= #{recipeno}
